full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN TZONG KHA PA'I RNAM THAR CHEN MO'I ZUR 'DEBS RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B DE LTAR ZUR 'DEBS SHIN TU @013A *, ,BSDUS PA'I RNAM THAR 'DI NI 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOS BGYIS PA'O,, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,RJE BTZUN RED MNGA' BA'I THUGS LAS 'KHRUNGS PA'I SRAS BDUN NI, NYID KYI ZHAL NAS, SBYANGS PA'I MCHOG GYUR KUN MKHYEN SHES 'OD DANG, SRAS GYI MCHOG GYUR BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL, ,NYAMS LEN MCHOG GYUR KUN DGA' DPAL BZANG PO,, SHES RAB MCHOG GYUR NYI MA RGYAL MTSAN DANG, ,BRTZE LDAN MCHOG GYUR DPAL 'BYOR SHES RAB DANG, ,'CHANG MKHAS MCHOG GYUR BSOD NAMS SHES RAB DANG, ,RTZOD PA MCHOG GYUR DAR MA RIN CHEN TE, ,GZHUNG  LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I BSHES GNYEN BDUN, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,AOm SVA STI, ,THUB BSTAN 'DZIN MAR SKAL BZANG ZHING BA'I TSOGS, ,PHAN BDE'I LO TOG LONGS SU SBYONG BA'I PHYIR, ,BKRA SHIS GA-YAS SU 'KHYIL BA'I CHOS GRVA LAS, ,CHOS SBYIN BDUD RTZI'I GRU CHAR 'DI PHAB PA'O,, ,,)
